sentences.en: Both quantum mechanics and chaos theory suggest a world constantly in flux.
sentences.cn: 量子力学和混沌理论都表明世界永远处于不断变化中。

sentences.en: Can anyone suggest a method of deterring spiders which is ecologically sound?
sentences.cn: 有人能想出一种不会破坏生态环境而又能够赶跑蜘蛛的办法吗？

sentences.en: I phoned Nicola long distance to suggest it.
sentences.cn: 我给妮古拉打了长途电话，向她作此提议。

sentences.en: I suggest we fit you up with an office suite.
sentences.cn: 我建议我们给你配备一间办公套房。

sentences.en: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentences.cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentences.en: I suggest you think over your position very carefully.
sentences.cn: 我建议你认真考虑一下你的处境。

sentences.en: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.cn: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

sentences.en: It is ridiculous to suggest we are having a romance.
sentences.cn: 暗示我们正在谈恋爱的说法真是太荒谬了。

sentences.en: It is wrong to suggest that there are easy alternatives.
sentences.cn: 如果认为有更容易的选择,那就错了.

sentences.en: May we suggest you try one of our guest houses.
sentences.cn: 可否请您体验一下我们的客房？

sentences.en: Reports from Chad suggest that rebel forces are advancing on the capital.
sentences.cn: 来自乍得的报告显示叛军正向首都推进。

sentences.en: So may I humbly suggest we all do something next time.
sentences.cn: 那么鄙人可否建议下次我们大家都要做点事。

sentences.en: Surely nobody would suggest turning him out of the house.
sentences.cn: 当然不会有人建议把他从房子里赶出去。

sentences.en: The signs suggest that the elections will be non-violent and fair.
sentences.cn: 种种迹象表明选举将会是非暴力的、公正的。

sentences.en: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.cn: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.en: Their success is conditional, I suggest, on this restriction.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们能否成功取决于这一限制因素.

sentences.en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentences.cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

words.tran_cn: 可建议的；耳根软的；易受影响的
提示地；引起联想地；暗示地
建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象

trans.tran_en: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

trans.tran_cn: 建议， 提议； 表明， 暗示； 使人想到
